s1.name: Mailing lists
s1.p:
For sending questions to the JORAM users and developers community, please post mails to the joram@objectweb.org forum. For browsing its archives or subscribing to it, check ObjectWeb's
mailing lists service.

For getting in touch with the JORAM development team only (the team also receives and reads the community mails), post mails to joram-team@objectweb.org. Please make sure you do not send infos which may be of interest to the JORAM community.
